title: Agent Provocateur Script
content:
Hey guys,

Anybody know this script?

Thanks heaps!

Best from Sydney

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150410033555im_/http:/typophile.com/files/agent_6509.jpg)
author: J_P_C

comments.content:
JPC, it's custom, here you go:

[http://www.creativepro.com/article/agent-provocateur-taps-house-industri...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150410033555/http:/www.creativepro.com/article/agent-provocateur-taps-house-industries-to-tweak-the-curves- "http://www.creativepro.com/article/agent-provocateur-taps-house-industries-to-tweak-the-curves-")
[P22 Imperial Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20150410033555/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/ihof/p22_imperial_script/) is a copperplate script with a similar bounce.
The original was Shelley Script if I remember correctly.

[http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=clothing&category=knickers](http://web.archive.org/web/20150410033555/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=clothing&category=knickers "http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=clothing&category=knickers")

bj's link was giving me errors:
